record.id: field.name="query.names" and file.name="agent" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: query.names
record.file.name: agent

brief.brief: A field of stored queries in the record used by the agent to update charts and marquees on your user's forms.

detail.detail: Each query returns a string containing the number of records selected. This string is stored as an element in a list, called $L.results, that corresponds to the position on the list of the query requesting the count.
To return the second stored query value (pri.1) in this example, use the following expression:
str(tod())+": There are "+2 in $L.results+" CRITICAL priority incidents.
